rootItem.title: Version-agnostic anchor resource for codelist C163393

self.title: CDISC Questionnaire HCS Test Code Terminology

name: Hypoglycemic Confidence Scale Questionnaire Test Code
preferredTerm: CDISC Questionnaire HCS Test Code Terminology
synonyms: Hypoglycemic Confidence Scale Questionnaire Test Code

terms.definition: Hypoglycemic Confidence Scale - How confident are you that you can stay safe from serious problems with hypoglycemia: When you are exercising?
Hypoglycemic Confidence Scale - How confident are you that you can stay safe from serious problems with hypoglycemia: When you are sleeping?
Hypoglycemic Confidence Scale - How confident are you that you can stay safe from serious problems with hypoglycemia: When you are driving?
Hypoglycemic Confidence Scale - How confident are you that you can stay safe from serious problems with hypoglycemia: When you are in social situations?
terms.preferredTerm: HCS - When You Are in Social Situations
synonyms: HCS01-When You Are in Social Situations

terms.definition: Hypoglycemic Confidence Scale - How confident are you that you can stay safe from serious problems with hypoglycemia: When you are alone?
Hypoglycemic Confidence Scale - In general, how confident are you that you can: Avoid serious problems due to hypoglycemia?
Hypoglycemic Confidence Scale - In general, how confident are you that you can: Catch and respond to hypoglycemia before your blood sugars get too low?
terms.preferredTerm: HCS - Catch Before Sugars Get Too Low
synonyms: HCS01-Catch Before Sugars Get Too Low

terms.definition: Hypoglycemic Confidence Scale - In general, how confident are you that you can: Continue to do the things you really want to do in your life, despite the risks of hypoglycemia?
terms.preferredTerm: HCS - Continue to Do Things Really Want
synonyms: HCS01-Continue to Do Things Really Want

terms.definition: Hypoglycemic Confidence Scale - If you have a spouse or partner: What is your best guess about how confident your spouse or partner feels about your ability to avoid serious problems due to hypoglycemia?
terms.preferredTerm: HCS - Your Ability to Avoid Problems

terms.definition: Hypoglycemic Confidence Scale - Mean HCS score.
